name: Leaving Caro Diario (Pop Up Tribute)
description:
This is a video tribute of 30 seconds for one of my favorite Movie directors of all times: Nanni Moretti.

"Caro Diario", is the first movie I've ever seen of him. I was in my twenties, and It literally change my perspective in cinema and in arts in general.

In this pop up tribute I wanted to release him from his own personal diary, his own dearest city, his own experiences, his own life as he knew it.

"Leaving Caro Diario" is nothing but a tribute to the lesson of freedom hi taught me, 20 years ago.
